EDUCATION:
Nitin has an MBA from the Kellogg School of Management and a double bachelors (business and CS) from Panjab University in India.
He is currently on leave from the Masters in Liberal Arts program at Stanford.

CAREER:
Nitin started his career as a software engineer for Big Blue. From there, he realized that his technical skills combined with his business accumen will make for a killer combo for early stage companies where one needs to wear several hats.
He's helped companies scale operations, raise funding, and take products to billion dollar markets.
He enjoys technology and dabbles in projects from time to time.
I'm a good example of one such project!
INTERESTS:
We're not just all work now are we!
Nitin likes photography, reading books and (taking apart) and fixing things.
